TERMS & CONDITIONS
Payment Terms:
The total cost of [Plot/Flat]. [1001] is to be paid as per the following schedule: Booking Amount : [10% Sale value] First Installment: Rs. [Insert Amount] (due on [Insert Date]) Second Installment: Rs. [Insert Amount] (due on [Insert Date]) Third Installment: Rs. [Insert Amount] (due on [Insert Date]) Any delay in payment beyond the due date will attract interest at the rate prescribed under the Telangana RERA rules. All payments should be made via cheque, demand draft, NEFT/RTGS, or any other method specified by Epitome Projects LLP. The payment should be received by a person who is within the buyer's blood relation. Cancellation Terms:
In the event of cancellation by the Customer, a written request must be submitted to Epitome Projects LLP. For cancellation of Plot after payment, Epitome Projects LLP shall deduct 20% of the Booking Amount paid by the customer as cancellation charges Refund Terms:
Refund of the remaining amount (if any) will be processed within 45 to 90 working days from the date of receipt of the cancellation request. Refunds will be made via the same payment mode through which the original payments were made. General Terms:
This allotment is subject to compliance with the terms of the Agreement of Sale, to be executed within 30 days of this allotment letter. In the event of non-payment of the balance amount or violation of the terms of this allotment, Epitome Projects LLP reserves the right to cancel the allotment and forfeit the booking amount. All disputes, if any, shall be subject to the jurisdiction of the courts in Telangana. We request you to carefully review the terms outlined in this letter. Should you have any questions or require further clarification.
Thank you for choosing Epitome Projects LLP. We look forward to completing this transaction to your satisfaction.
